name: The Too-Helpful Knight
description:
You're the King, and your loyal Knight is eager to help you in battle... just don't let him weigh you down too much. A brief, three-level demo that explores the perks - and perils - of having a loyal warrior who just wants to help.

Like what you see? Check out my other stuff at bymuno.com, and consider signing up to the mailing list for future game news!

Created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Supports both controller and keyboard!

Solo project, made in Godot. All sprite art is original, but a lot of it was created well before the jam, for other projects (and then modifed during the 48h to fit the theme). Uses some code I developed for another project, which handles boiler-plate things like camera movement, collisions, etc.

The music is a rhythm-section-only, swing cover of Louie Zong's wonderful "Hello World" - arranged by me (before the jam; it's a WIP of a full cover I hope to release eventually).

The sound effects are from the "se_old_pack00.zip" download on this website.
